articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Industrial Establishments
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Industrial Establishments
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the  Chonma Electrical Machine Plant and the Tahungsan Machine Plant alive with a high-pitched drive for pushing back the frontiers of science. 
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Chonma Electrical  Machine Plant.
					
					 After being briefed on the modernization of the plant, he looked round production processes for hours to acquaint himself in detail with its technological updating and production.
					
					  He highly appreciated the shining successes made by the workers of the plant, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they have brought about a signal boost in the production of electrical machines by successfully putting the production processes on a CNC, modern and scientific basis. 
					
					 Looking at technologically improved machines and equipment and varieties of high precision products, he noted that the workers of the plant have brought out an eye-opening boost in production by solving many scientific and technological problems by their own efforts and with their own technology through a full display of creative wisdom and effective cooperation. He highly estimated the ardent enthusiasm with which they are waging the drive for pushing back the frontiers of science and technology, fully determined to glorify the country through an intellect campaign and technique campaign. 
					
					 He said that this laudable reality of the plant goes to prove that it is possible to surely attain any eminence of cutting-edge science and technology, when full play is given to the strong mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation, inexhaustible creative ingenuity and enormous technological and economic potentials. 
					
					 Saying that in the era in which knowledge-based economy is making rapid progress thanks to the comprehensive development of science and technology, massive accumulation of knowledge and its wide use a pioneer in pushing back the frontiers of science is a conqueror and victor of the future, he underscored the need to wage a strenuous drive to push back the frontiers of science in all sectors for building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Looking at varieties of daily necessities made by the plant through an effective use of by-products, he appreciated the high quality of products and the spirit of serving the people displayed by its workers in their persevering efforts to improve the people's standard of living.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the compound of the plant  with lots of trees of various species, he said that it is a success to be proud of  that the plant has  established a high level of cultured practices in production and life by successfully sprucing up its interior like a palace and its exterior like a park.  This is the precious fruition of love shown by the workers of the plant for plant and for the country, he added.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the plant.  
					
					The next leg of his guidance was the Taehungsan Machine Plant. 
					
					 He looked round different workshops of the plant and products there to acquaint himself in detail with its technological updating and production. 
					
					  Looking at lots of various type machines put on a CNC basis and quality machine products in every shop, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers and technicians of the plant have brought about a leaping advance in production by developing cutting-edge technology. 
					
					 He highly praised the workers of the plant for their feats, greatly pleased to learn that they have modernized it by their own efforts and with their own technology by fully displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, thus playing a pace-setter's role in pushing back the frontiers of science. 
					
					 Then he went round supply service facilities including a bean store to learn about the supply service for the workers. 
					
					 He appreciated the efforts exerted by the officials of the plant for enabling it to emerge a model plant in supply service. 
					
					 He advanced important tasks to be carried out by the plant.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Phyong Hae, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Ri Jae Il, first vice department director of the C. C., the WPK.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Leaves for Thailand
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Leaves for Thailand
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly led by its Vice-Chairwoman Hong Son Ok left here by air on Thursday to attend the 122nd General Assembly of the Inter-Parliamentary Union to be held in Thailand.

articles.title: Centenary of Demise of An Jung Gun Observed
articles.content:
Centenary of Demise of An Jung Gun Observed
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The History Society of the DPRK issued an article on Thursday 100 years since An Jung Gun, a patriotic martyr, was killed by the Japanese imperialist hangmen.
					 An Jung Gun shot to death Hirobumi Ito, the chieftain of Japan's aggression on Korea, at Haerbin Railway Station on Oct. 26, 1909. This was a stern punishment meted out to the Japanese imperialists by the Korean people as well as a patriotic deed as it showed that the Koreans are a nation strong in the spirit of independence and they do not fear to die for the restoration of the national sovereignty, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Prompted by the desire to save the destiny of the country on  decline, martyr An joined in the patriotic cultural enlightenment movement and the campaign for the repayment of the national loan to Japan and turned out in the Righteous Volunteers Army Movement against the Japanese imperialists when they escalated their aggression on Korea.
					
					 His shooting to death of Ito was not simply prompted by his anti-Japanese sentiment but carried out by him as part of the RVAM, one of the forms of Korean people's anti-Japanese struggle, to fulfil his duty as chief of its staff.
					
					 Therefore, he should have been treated as a prisoner of war under international law rather than being tried at the Japanese imperialists' court.
					
					 His action was also part of the just struggle of the Korean people against the imperialist aggression on other nations, wishing for peace of the Orient.
					
					 While being in prison, he authored the "Theory on Peace in the East" to expose the unreasonableness and dangerous nature of the Japanese imperialists' policy of aggression and express his stand against it.
					
					 He linked the peace in the East with the issue of Korea's independence, in particular, and contended that the peace of the East could be preserved only when Korea became free from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 The world recognized his patriotic deed as an action of rejecting Japan's "protectorate" over Korea little short of a colonial rule and declaring the Korean people's just resistance against the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 An's shooting to death of Ito was as good as indicting before the world the Japanese imperialists for their colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 He cited 15-point defence exposing the crimes of Hirobumi Ito to justify his killing. His assertions were a historical indictment passed not only on Ito but on the Japanese imperialists who trampled upon the sovereignty and independence of Korea. They clarified the reason why the Korean nation came to harbor resentment against Japan and the justice of its anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					 When Ito was shot to death, the Japanese imperialists embellished his career of aggression to the utmost in a bid to conceal their horror.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists hanged him to death at the then Lushun prison on Mar. 26, 1910 and secretly buried his body for fear of the Korean people's protest against Japan while working hard to hide their crime.
					
					 100 years have passed since then, but the Korean people still remember the never-to-be-condoned hideous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past and will force Japan to pay for them without fail.

articles.title: Relics and Fossil Remains Displayed
articles.content:
Relics and Fossil Remains Displayed
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of relics and fossil remains discovered in Chongphadae Cave was opened at Nature Museum at Kim Il Sung University Thursday.
					 Researchers of a room for research into history of human evolution and development deepened the survey of the basin of the River Taedong centering around Pyongyang in recent years. As a result, they discovered various relics and fossil remains dating back to the Paleolithic Age including seven pieces of five anthropolites, 2,038 pieces of stoneware, 10,772 pieces of fossil animal bones of 33 kinds, 13 bonfire sites in Chongphadae Cave in the township of Hwangju County. The discovery helped tell how old the sedimentary layer of the cave is with the help of modern measuring devices and scientifically ascertain the age of the above-said site. 
					
					 Put on display there are the recently unearthed relics and fossil remains.
					
					 Two fossil upper jawbones and three fossil lower jawbones believed to be those of Neolithic men who existed approximately from 60,000 to 20,000 years ago prove that the basin of the River Taedong centering around Pyongyang was home to the ancestors of the Korean nation.
					
					 Stoneware found on two cultural layers which are different from each other in the method of construction and arrangement clearly testifies to the process of the orderly law-governed development of the culture in the Paleolithic Age in the basin of the River Taedong.
					
					 More than 70 hand axes provide irrefutable material evidence once again refuting the wrong preceding archaeological view that only chopper culture existed in the Asian region in the Paleolithic Age.
					
					 Also on display are 33 kinds of fossil animals and 1,572 sporae-pollen fossils proving that the area around the cave had conditions favorable for living such as animal hunting and collection of edible plants.

articles.title: Anniversary of Associations of DPRK-Laos Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Associations of DPRK-Laos Marked
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A meeting and film show took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Thursday to mark the 20th anniversary of the formation of the DPRK-Laos Friendship Association and the Laos-DPRK Friendship Association.
					 Present there on invitation were Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 On hand were Pak Kwan O, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee of the DPRK who is chairman of the friendship association, officials concerned and working people here.
					
					 Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is vice-chairman of the friendship association, addressing the meeting, said that the friendship associations have encouraged the two peoples in their struggle for socialist construction, having brisk visits, cooperation and friendship over the past 20 years. 
					
					 He expressed the belief that the friendship associations would take the lead in the efforts to develop the friendly and cooperative relations in conformity with the wishes and interests of the two peoples.
					
					 The Lao ambassador in his speech noted that the friendship associations have played important roles in boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and promoted the multi-faceted cooperation in the past. 
					
					 He hoped that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow strong.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants watched the Korean documentary "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung meets with heads of state and prominent figures of different countries" Part 7.

articles.title: First Round of Premier League Ends
articles.content:
First Round of Premier League Ends
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The first round of the premier league which had begun on February 20 in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has come to an end.
					 It, which took place amid growing public interest in football, touched off by the DPRK's winning qualification for the World Cup, showed a considerable improvement of all the teams ((9 male and 8 female teams) in tactical, physical and technical aspects.
					
					 The Rimyongsu, Mangyongbong and Sobaeksu teams took the first three places respectively in the male matches, while the April 25, Wolmido and Jebi teams in female matches.
					
					 The second round will begin on March 27.

articles.title: World TB Day Observed
articles.content:
World TB Day Observed
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The World Tuberculosis Day was observed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea with functions held in the Grand People's Study House in Pyongyang on March 24.
					 The functions were participated in by officials and doctors from the Ministry of Public Health and tuberculosis prevention and treatment establishments across the country, and the representative of the World Health Organization (WHO) and members of other international organizations in Pyongyang.
					
					 They had a symposium on success and experience gained in the efforts for eradicating tuberculosis and watched a science film, "Tuberculosis" (Part 1), produced in cooperation with WHO.
					
					 They then saw the books and photos on display in the house.

articles.title: Doctorate of Medicine Awarded to German Figure
articles.content:
Doctorate of Medicine Awarded to German Figure
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Honorary doctorate of medicine of the DPRK was awarded to Renate Hess, secretary general of the Hans Neuffer Foundation of the German Association of Doctors, with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
					 Renate Hess made a positive contribution to improving the level of medical services in the DPRK and other countries and developing medical science and technology.

articles.title: New Avermectin-making Method Developed
articles.content:
New Avermectin-making Method Developed
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Aeguk Research Center for Compound Microorganisms of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have succeeded in making avermectin (AVM), a bio-agricultural chemical of the 21st century, with new fermentation technology and developed a technology for mass-producing it.
					 It is applicable to agriculture, stockbreeding, afforestation and other sectors. Having a long-time, strong insecticidal and miticidal effect, it can almost exterminate several dozen species of harmful insects with strong resistant properties.
					
					 The atoxic chemical gives no harmful effect on grains, fruits, vegetables and other farm products, human body and ecological environment including land, while considerably raising the efficacy of extermination with a negligible amount.
					
					 Hookworm and roundworm medical powder, pill and injection made with AVM are well received not only in animal husbandry and veterinary work but in public health.
					
					 Its efficacy has already been proved in the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, Samjigang Co-op Farm in Jaeryong County, Kosan Fruit Farm, Kyenam Stock Farm in South Hwanghae Province and other units.

articles.title: Israel's Moves to Disturb Mideast Peace Assailed
articles.content:
Israel's Moves to Disturb Mideast Peace Assailed
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Some days ago Israel announced its plan to build Jewish apartments in east Kuds. This is a deliberate and premeditated provocation aimed at torpedoing the indirect talks with Palestine.
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					It goes on: 
					
					Israel does not want Mideast peace and a solution to the Palestinian issue but only seeks territorial expansion.
					
					Israel is grabbing one portion of the Palestinian territory after another by building Jewish apartments in the area under its occupation on a large scale in a bid to put the area in its possession. 
					
					The expansion of "Jewish settlements" is not a mere issue of building apartments but a very acute and serious political and national issue for the Palestinian people because it is a matter of meekly leaving their inviolable territory to the tender mercy of the aggressors or defending it.
					
					Palestine regards a stop to the expansion of "Jewish settlements" as a fundamental condition for the resumption of peace talks. This is quite a just proposal in the light of the nature and purpose of the talks and from a logical and practical viewpoint.
					
					It is the core issue of ensuring peace in the Mideast to force Israel to take hands off the illegally occupied Arab territories. Without this action on the part of Israel is it impossible to establish an independent state of Palestine or achieve Mideast peace.
					
					It is shameless rhetoric for Israel, an aggressor and territorial grabber, to assert that the expansion of "Jewish settlements" is inevitable because of population growth. 
					
					Just is the action of the Arab countries to achieve Mideast peace on the "peace-for-land principle".
					
					The Korean people will as ever positively support the Palestinian and other Arab people in their just struggle, concludes the article.

articles.title: All Fields Called on to Steadily Push back Frontiers of Science
articles.content:
All Fields Called on to Steadily Push back Frontiers of Science
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- All the people in the DPRK should intensify the drive for pushing back the frontiers of science and technology by dint of their single-minded unity around the Workers' Party of Korea, the might of Korean-style socialism and the mental power based on the strong self-esteem of the nation and thus demonstrate the mettle of the DPRK before the world and bring earlier the historical day of the emergence of a great prosperous and powerful nation. This call is made by an editorial of Rodong Sinmun Thursday. 
					 The editorial goes on: 
					
					 Pushing back the frontiers of science and technology is a law-governed requirement of the age of knowledge-based economy and the most important goal of building a thriving nation. It is a realistic requirement for bringing earlier a great victory in the drive for a great surge to maximize the speed of advance. 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea aims to hold its grip on the major levers of the ultramodern science and technology in the shortest possible time and put the DPRK in a legitimate status of a highly civilized power with strong capacity of development on the basis of the tremendous mental power of
						 Kim Il Sung's nation and inexhaustible creative ingenuity, enormous technological and economic potentials and successes achieved in the drive for a great revolutionary surge. This is its idea of pushing back the frontiers of science and technology. 
					
					 Only when all sectors of the national economy make leaping advances to attain higher goals, pushing back the frontiers of science and technology in hearty response to the Party's call, is it possible to firmly take the initiative in the economic development in the new century, while consolidating the position of the DPRK as a politico-ideological and military power, and carve out a rosy future of prosperity on this land. 
					
					 The DPRK will advance faster for higher goals of ultramodern science and technology as it has good and talented people having mental power strong enough to carry out whatever project determined by the Party to do, brave creative spirit and patriotic enthusiasm, the strong economic and technological potentials built by them, tightening their belts in face of stern trials and a large contingent of persons of talent.
					
					 The editorial calls on all of them to wage a bold drive for steadily pushing back the frontiers of science and technology in all fields, demonstrating the creative spirit of Songun Korea in response to the call of the WPK, and thus attain the high goals of modernization and scientization and successfully realize its grandiose plan for building a thriving nation as early as possible.

articles.title: Prompt Resumption of Tourism Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Prompt Resumption of Tourism Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations including the Solidarity for Progress in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on March 22 calling for prompt resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					 At the press conference the organizations referred to the fact that the tour of Mt. Kumgang has been driven into a catastrophic crisis owing to the desperate obstruction of the present regime.
					
					 They noted that the tour of Mt. Kumgang, a symbol of inter-Korean reconciliation and cooperation, had lasted in keeping with the desire of the nation though there were some difficult and complicated problems. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the "Ministry of Unification" and other present ruling forces have been engaged in depreciating the achievements made in the past economic cooperation work under the unreasonable pretexts, they charged.
					
					 The "Ministry of Unification" is still calling in question the guarantee for personal safety, repeatedly assured by the DPRK, they noted, contending that such behavior is nothing but an intention to completely suspend tourism.
					
					 Warning that the authorities will be bound to face punishment by history if they persist in the hostile policy toward the DPRK and hinder the south-north cooperation, the organizations urged them to immediately opt for resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang.

articles.title: Actions against Suppression of Trade Unions Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions against Suppression of Trade Unions Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Trade unions under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions including the Government Employees Union and the Construction and Transport Workers Union at a joint press conference on March 22 called for struggling against the puppet authorities' suppression to the last. 
					 A press release read out at the conference accused the authorities of frantically intensifying the suppression of activities of trade unions under the KCTU by mobilizing all their power after branding them as "illegal ones". 
					
					 This suppression is aimed to ward off the protest of the core forces of the KCTU against the dictatorship of the "government" and the "Grand National Party" with the "election to the local self-governing bodies" at hand, the press release noted.
					
					 Warning that the organizations would react to the authorities' suppression of the KCTU with actions, the press release called on all the people to turn out in the actions for the democratization of the society and the guarantee of the workers' basic rights.

articles.title: Apr. Anniversary Marked in Guinea and Nigeria
articles.content:
Apr. Anniversary Marked in Guinea and Nigeria
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given in Guinea and a seminar in Nigeria on March 17 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the 17th anniversary of General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Camano Vitor, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, Guinea, said in the lecture that to believe in the people as in Heaven is the idea set forth by President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, as his lifelong motto and it is the political idea Kim Jong Il has consistently embodied.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has devoted his all to the country and the people, regarding it as his political creed to solve any problem in reliance on the people, the chairman said, adding: Socialism of the DPRK has become the people-centered socialism in which the people are the master of everything and everything serves them because it has embodied the idea of believing in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 He stressed that Korean-style socialism based on the political philosophy of believing in the people as in Heaven will shine forever as the country for the people and socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Aba Sadik Abubakr, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, and other speakers said at the seminar that Kim Il Sung is the outstanding leader with distinguished leadership ability. And they highly praised him as the great master of leadership and the peerlessly great person who defeated the Japanese and U.S. imperialisms and built a socialist country, independent in politics, self-sufficient in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, in Korea.
					
					 They hoped that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in building a great prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Italy
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Italy
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun was formed on March 18.
					The secretary of the Fermo City Committee of the Communist Party of Italy was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to publish and disseminate works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and hold diverse political and cultural events including seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: AH de RPDC elogia la accion de    An Jung Gun
articles.content:
AH de RPDC elogia la accion de    An Jung Gun
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ATCC) -- En ocasion del centesimo aniversario desde cuando el martir patriotico An Jung Gun, quien ejecuto a Hirobumi Ito, caudillo de la agresion de Japon a Corea, fue asesinado por los verdugos imperialistas japoneses, la Asociacion de Historiadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 25 un articulo que senala:
					La ejecucion a Hirobumi Ito efectuada el 26 de octubre de 1909 por An Jung Gun en la estacion ferroviaria de Haerbin fue un castigo tajante de los coreanos a los imperialistas japoneses y un comportamiento patriotico que demostro que la coreana es la nacion con el firme espiritu independiente y el pueblo que dedica hasta su vida para rescatar el Poder estatal.
					
					Con el deseo de salvar el destino de la nacion que iba a arruinarse mas con el paso de los dias, An Jung Gun se precipito en el movimiento patriotico por la ilustracion cultural y la compensacion de la deuda nacional y participo en la lucha armada de voluntarios cuando se intensificaban las maniobras de Japon para agredir Corea.
					
					El citado acto de An no fue originado de un impulso del simple sentimiento antijapones sino de una parte de la lucha armada de voluntarios, un tipo de la lucha antijaponesa del pueblo coreano. Y An cumplio el deber de las tropas de los soldados voluntarios en calidad del jefe de Estado Mayor de estas tropas.
					
					Por tanto, el no debia ser llevado al tribunal de los imperialistas japoneses sino tratado como prisionero de guerra segun la ley internacional.
					
					Ademas, su acto resulta un eslabon de la lucha justa del pueblo coreano que deseaba la paz del Asia Oriental y se oponia a la agresion de los imperialistas contra otra nacion.
					
					En su libro "Teoria de la paz en Asia Oriental", escrito en la prision, el revelo la injusticia y la peligrosidad de la politica de agresion de los imperialistas japoneses y expreso su criterio.
					
					En particular, el combino la paz de Asia Oriental con el problema de la independencia de Corea, considero que no hay necesidad de discutirlo bajo la dominacion colonial de los imperialistas japoneses sobre Corea e insistio en que seria posible preservar la paz en Asia Oriental solo despues de ser alcanzada la independencia de Corea.
					
					A traves de su actitud patriotica, An Jung Gun dio a conocer a todo el mundo que la "dominacion de proteccion" de Japon sobre Corea no es otra sino la gobernacion colonial, y que su acto es la respuesta de justicia de los coreanos sobre la gobernacion colonial de los imperialistas japoneses.
					
					La conducta de An fue un acto que denuncio ante el mundo las maniobras de colonizacion de Japon a Corea.
					
					Al aclarar las razones de su acto An Jung Gun condeno con justos argumentos los crimenes de Hirobumi Ito compuestos de 15 articulos.
					
					En aquel tiempo estos argumentos servian del acta de acusacion historica no solo sobre los crimenes de Hirobumi Ito sino tambien los actos criminales de los imperialistas japoneses que violaron la soberania y la independencia de Corea.
					
					Y reflejaron la causa del sentimiento antijapones y la justicia de la lucha antijaponesa de la nacion coreana.
					
					Cuando Hirobumi Ito fue eliminado por An Jung Gun los imperialistas japoneses disimularon su temor morboso y embellecieron extremadamente sus actos agresivos.
					
					Estos imperialistas ahorcaron el 26 de marzo de 1910 a An Jung Gun en la carcel de Lushun.
					
					Y temidos de la resistencia antijaponesa del pueblo coreano, ellos enterraron en secreto el cadaver de An y maniobraron para encubrir sus crimenes.
					
					Aunque pasaron los 100 anos desde entonces, el pueblo coreano no esta olvidando jamas los imperdonables actos de los imperialistas japoneses cometidos en el pasado y hara que estos paguen sin falta el precio de sus crimenes.

articles.title: ATCC informa exitos cientificos y tecnicos alcanzados en Corea
articles.content:
ATCC informa exitos cientificos y tecnicos alcanzados en Corea
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ATCC) -- La Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea hizo publica el dia 24 la informacion sobre numerosos exitos cientificos y tecnicos de talla mundial alcanzados en Corea.
					En los ultimos anos, bajo la sabia direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien dio iniciativa a desarrollar la campana para conquistar las tecnologias de punta fue producido un gran salto en el desarrollo de las ciencias y tecnicas del pais.
					
					 Comienza asi la informacion y prosigue:
					
					 En abril del ano pasado la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea lanzo exitosamente el satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong No.2" fabricado el cien por ciento con sus propias fuerzas, inteligencias y tecnicas, lo cual sirvio del jalon historico en el desarrollo de las ciencias y tecnicas del pais.
					
					 En ultimos anos, los cientificos del dominio de la ciencia agricola investigaron y aplicaron los hibridos simples al estilo coreano que garantizan la radiante perspectiva del cultivo de arroz y criaron las variedades cereales de alto rendimiento como el hibrido simple de maiz y la semilla de soya, asi como establecieron el sistema de produccion de variedad original de patatas sin virus.
					
					 Tambien, fueron investigados e introducidos los eficientes metodos de cultivo incluyendo el de las nutritivas posturas de arroz en cantero frio y plantacion escasa y el doble cultivo conveniente al cultivo de doble cosecha y nuevos metodos de fertilizacion que surte mas de dos veces de eficiencia.
					
					 Fueron desarrollados el fertilizante fosforico y bacteriano capaz de convertir el compuesto fosforico de la tierra para que la planta agricola lo pudiera absorber y Avermectin, nuevo producto agroquimico que no tiene ninguna toxicidad y la contaminacion ambiental.
					
					 En el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero modernizaron completamente los procesos productivos en su conjunto y dieron acabado al sistema de control por computadora al estilo coreano conforme a las caracteristicas de la industria quimica.
					
					 De este modo,  fue posible producir en avalancha el vinalon y una gran cantidad de productos quimicos de centenares de variedades que se necesitan apremiantemente a la industria ligera y la agricultura.
					
					 En el dominio de la industria ligera fueron preparadas firmemente las garantias cientificas y tecnicas para elevar la vida del pueblo incluyendo el desarrollo de la bacteria compuesta de nuevo tipo que sirve de la particular materia de fermentacion y saladura en el procesamiento de alimentos.
					
					  Los cientificos y tecnicos desarrollaron la tecnologia CNC y fabricaron a su gusto los equipos CNC de alta eficiencia que asegura la alta velocidad, la alta precision y el control intelectual cimentando asi la firme base para poner la industria mecanica del pais  en el nivel de punta.
					
					  El Complejo de Acero de Songjin establecio el sistema de produccion de acero a estilo coreano y el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek construyo el alto horno de acero Juche que se basa en las materias primas y combustible abundantes en Corea.
					
					 El horno electrico UHP fue construido por las propias  fuerzas y  tecnicas  durante unos meses.
					
					  Se progreso mas el sistema coreano OS y basandose en esto fue investigado y completado el aparato de tratamiento de informaciones de alta eficiencia, tecnica de punta, y se desarrollan incesantemente los programas nuevos y eficientes de talla mundial.
					
					  El programa "KCC Paduk" de Corea muestra el nivel de desarrollo y la gran potencialidad de la tecnologia IT.
					
					  Esta echando la base material y tecnica para establecer el modo innovador de vida social, economica y cultural como la administracion y la gestion basadas en IT, el teleautomatico del proceso productivo-tecnico, el comercio electronico y la educacion a distancia.
					
					  Fue preparado el proceso productivo de fibras antibioticas de Nano basado en las materias primas de Corea.
					
					En particular, al fabricar el microscopio-tunel escaner se abrio la brecha en  la investigacion de la tecnica Nano y en el desarrollo de las mercancias basadas en esta tecnologia.
					
					  Los cientificos del dominio de la biotecnologia llevaron al nivel mundial las tecnicas basicas entre otras el analisis de gene e informaciones organicas y amplian la esfera de su aplicacion.
					
					  Gracias al desarrollo de la tecnica de la prospeccion maritima se puede impulsar con perspectiva en el nivel alto la exploracion de los recursos submarinos y la observacion maritima.
					
					  Tambien, fueron investigadas exitosamente la tecnica de escultura de dibujos tridimensionales por laser.
					
					  Los obreros y tecnicos de la Mina Juventud Heroina de Taehung realizaron excelentemente la fundamentacion cientifica de la industria de clinker magnesita estableciendo el sistema productivo que se apoya en los recursos y tecnicas nacionales.
					
					  En el dominio de la ciencia medica fue establecido el sistema nacional de servicio medico de larga distancia, se desarrollo el aparato de purificacion y desinfeccion del aire introduciendolo en la rama de salud publica y se invento la materia anti-cancer utilizando las abundantes materias medicas de Coryo.
					
					  Tambien, fueron desarrollados al estilo coreano el gran esterilizador de agua y la tecnica de explotacion del agua subterranea del mar.
					
					  Y los cientificos coreanos realizaron la industrializacion de la produccion del hongo y asentaron la base cientifica para solucionar el problema de pienso en la piscicultura.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica a Israel de perturbador de paz del Medio Oriente
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica a Israel de perturbador de paz del Medio Oriente
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ATCC) -- Hace poco, Israel anuncio el plan de construir al este de Kuds  las viviendas de judios.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual difundido en su edicion de este jueves, lo califica de una provocacion premeditada para romper las conversaciones indirectas con Palestina y continua:
					
					Israel no desea la paz del Medio Oriente ni la solucion del problema palestino, sino tiene interes solo en la expansion territorial. 
					
					Israel construye en gran medida las viviendas de judios en las zonas ocupadas, de modo que se apodera poco a poco del territorio palestino. 
					
					La ampliacion de los "asentamientos" de judios no es un simple problema de construccion de viviendas, sino es un asunto politico y nacional tan grave y agudo de ceder el sagrado territorio a los invasores o defenderlo.
					
					Palestina presenta el cese de la ampliacion de "asentamientos" de judios como una condicion fundamental para la reanudacion de las conversaciones de paz. Esto es una medida logica y justa tanto en el punto de vista de caracter y objetivo de estas conversaciones como en el sentido practico. 
					
					La clave principal para la paz del Medio Oriente reside en que Israel quita sus tentaculos de los suelos arabes ilegalmente ocupados. Si no, no puede ser realizada la fundacion del Estado soberano de Palestina ni preservada la paz del Medio Oriente. 
					
					Aunque Israel describe la ampliacion de los "asentamientos" de judios como lo inevitable por el aumento de la poblacion, esto es una locura descarada del agresor y usurpador del territorio ajeno. 
					
					Es muy justa la demanda de los paises arabes de lograr la paz del Medio Oriente en el "principio de cambiar el territorio con la paz". 
					
					En adelante tambien como en el pasado, el pueblo coreano enviara entero apoyo a la justa lucha del pueblo palestino y los paises arabes.

articles.title: Conquistemos la cumbre tecnologica  y saltemos mas alto
articles.content:
Conquistemos la cumbre tecnologica  y saltemos mas alto
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ATCC) -- Todos deben anticipar el dia historico en que Corea sera manifestada al mundo y sera declarada la gran potencia prospera al desarrollar la vigorosa campana de la batalla por conquistar la cumbre tecnologica a base del poderio de la unidad monolitica en torno al Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el poderio del socialismo al estilo coreano y la capacidad espiritual de la dignidad nacional.
					Asi exhorta el diario Rodong Sinmun en un editorial difundido el dia 25 y continua:
					
					Conquistar la cumbre tecnologica es la demanda legitima de la epoca de la economia intelectual, la mas importante meta en la lucha por construir la gran potencia prospera y la demanda realista para adelantar la gran victoria de gran auge elevando al maximo la velocidad de su marcha.
					
					La idea de conquistar la cumbre tecnologica del PTC es poner dignamente a Corea en la posicion de la potencia civilizada con la alta capacidad de desarrollo tomando las arterias de la cumbre tecnologica dentro del corto periodo sobre la base de la fuerte capacidad espiritual de la nacion de       Kim Il Sung, el inagotable talento creador, la firme potencialidad tecnica y economica y los exitos del gran auge revolucionario.
					
					Cuando conquistemos la cumbre tecnologica y saltemos mas alto en todos los frentes en respuesta al llamamiento del PTC podremos consolidar la posicion de la potencia ideo-politica y la militar, tomar firmemente la iniciativa del desarrollo economico de nuevo siglo y abrir sobre esta tierra patria el radiante futuro de la prosperidad.
					
					Nuestra patria saltara mas alto y rapidamente hacia la cima mundial mientras que existan el pueblo valiente y talentoso que es el fuerte en la capacidad espiritual quien cumple lo todo si decide el partido y que arde el corazon con valiente espiritu creador y el fervor patriotico, la firme potencialidad tecnica y economica y el gran contingente de cientificos y tecnicos que superaban las pruebas dificiles.
					
					En acato al llamamiento del PTC debemos manifestar con vigor el espiritu creador de Corea del Songun y librar la lucha energetica por conquistar de nuevo la cumbre tecnologica en todos los frentes y ocupar la meta mas elevada de la modernizacion y la cientifizacion y realizar brillantemente cuanto antes el gran proyecto del partido de construir la gran potencia prospera.
